For those who may not know what she looks like: http://www.flickr.com/photos/40466689@N0...
15222222222221.title: Singer's Choices

152222222222211.content:
You had the opportunity to meet the beautiful Rihanna after meeting her on the street. She invited you over to her house later at 7pm. Awesome, the chance to go over and chat to Rihanna. You spent the entire day thinking of what you would say to her with little success. Eventually you concluded that you would just be casual if possible and hope she starts the conversation.

You arrived Rihanna's house at bang on 7pm and rang on her doorbell. However as you did a strange blue gas came out of the bell and you felt queezy. You then fainted and woke up later to find yourself...
152222222222211.title: Opportunity Gone Wrong

1522222222222111.content:
You were on the center of Rihanna's bed. It was massive and smelt fresh as daisies. Her room was beautiful as well. You then realized that it was VERY big. As a matter of fact, everything was very big. Holy crap, you've shrunk! You deduced that you stood at 3 inches tall. Scarier still Rihanna could come in any minute. She must have done this. Ah well, you'd never hold a grudge against her. But why? Did she want to keep you, or worse, kill you? You didn't want to risk Rihanna killing you, so you jumped off the bed next to a slipper.

Then you heard Rihanna come in. She looked absolutely stunning as always. http://www.flickr.com/photos/40466689@N0... She was a vision in a white bikini and you then knew she shrank you. She started calling for you. "Little guy, where are you? You don't need to be nervous, that gas also made you invincible. It made me invincible too. You won't be hurt." You noticed that Rihanna was telling the truth. You jumped off the bed and were perfectly fine. Also she fell over hard earlier that day and not even a scratch on her leg. She looked around the room for you, but would she find you?
1522222222222111.title: Paradise, You Hope

choices: "Would you like to consummate this new relationship?"
"Could you give me a foot massage?"
15222222222221111.content:
Credit to her, she searched thoroughly around the room for you. At least if you found yourself lost Rihanna would find you. Then she looked at the side of the bed that you were on and looked at her many, many slippers. And she quickly found you at her white slippers. She smiled gently upon seeing you, which calmed your nerves a bit. "Aw there you are. Were you afraid of me?" Rihanna asked in a soft tone. You nodded slightly, avoiding eye contact with her. Though seemingly gentle her stare intimidated you. Then she tried to fully ease your nerves. "Look, I'm not gonna hurt you. I just want to keep you as a pet. All mine, and no one elses, I promise." she said to you getting even closer to you, forcing you to look back at her. Her lovely hazel eyes were hypnotic and her attempts to fully calm you worked.

"Okay then, Miss Rihanna. I'll be all yours." Politeness would gain you favor with Rihanna so calling her Miss would be a decent option. "Well thank you, cutie. I appreciate the manners. That'll go a long way." Well done, Rihanna called you cutie, and encouraged you to act as you have done. This was proving a good experience, so sucking up could be even better. "Miss Rihanna, will I be yours forever, please?" you asked with enthusiasm in your voice and she clearly liked this. "Of course you will, forever my new pet." Rihanna's smile remained gentle along with her voice and she was honest in her promise. Rihanna then picked you up into the palm of her hand, which was very nice and soft. She then sat down on the bed and asked you something.
15222222222221111.title: A New Life With Your Barbadian Goddess

152222222222211112.content:
Like politeness, appeasement to Rihanna's requests would also gain you favor with her, so you chose to appease. You had no reluctance though to massaging her feet, you just wondered what they smelt like, not really minding which. "Of course, Miss Rihanna. Anything you want." This remark pleased Rihanna. "Thank you, little fella. I think we're gonna have a good relationship, you and me." Rihanna put you down on the floor, and removed her high heels, the heel itself being one inch taller than you. Boy did you feel pathetic to her heel, and Rihanna smiled at your expression. She seemed to catch on to your thoughts. "Feeling small, little fella? You'll get used to it soon." The assurance would probably be true, you will have to get used to being 3 inches tall.

Rihanna's feet smelt wonderful. Fresh and clean. They were perfectly clean, and smooth to the touch. You started to rub her feet and hoped that Rihanna was satisfied with you. Her feet were massive compared to you and a foot fetish for her feet began to develop in you. You felt an unexpected lustful rush inside you and it forced you to ask something to Rihanna, which was potentially humiliating. "Miss Rihanna, since you are now my owner, may I kiss your feet in worship?" Rihanna was intrigued by the question. "Of course you may, give my feet the attention they deserve." That was your cue. So you started to kiss her feet, partly in worship of your beautiful new owner, partly because you realized you kinda liked it. This went on for about 5 minutes per feet and Rihanna was no doubt liking it from the expression on her face. "That was definitely the best foot massage I ever had. Thank you for that, sweetie. What would you like in return?" she asked you with an enthusiastic look in her eyes and voice. Oh the possibilities. You had a long thought about it and made up your mind.
152222222222211112.title: Fetish Defined

1522222222222111121.content:
Perhaps it was this new found fetish gone overboard, you could think of no other reason why the fuck you just asked Rihanna such an unorthodox question. But she didn't specify what she would offer you in return, so why not. "You seem to like my feet little one. Sure, why not." "I just like your feet Miss Rihanna. It's not too much my thing." That was true and she accepted it. "Okay then, prepare for my feet. Lie down first." You laid down on your back waiting for Rihanna's caramel feet to wrap themselves all over you.

She lifted you with her feet and you were high up in the air above Rihanna's bed. She was smiling with glee and you were glad she was also enjoying it. Her smile was so beautiful and sweet. Her teeth gleamed and her lips were oh so luscious. She was caressing you all over and you were in sheer delight. Not just the feet but really the fun you were having with Rihanna. You could watch her forever, and you were going to. Yes! She played with you doing various fun things, dangling you by the leg between her toes, rubbing her feet all over you, balancing you. It was all so fun.

After about 10 or 15 minutes the experience was over. Rihanna then suggested an idea to you.
1522222222222111121.title: Fun Time With Ri-Ri

choices: "Would you like to explore my body?"
1522222222222111122.content: Although you could have anything something sexual was too soon, and you were a bit shy about asking for a kiss from her. But Rihanna was a gentle type, and liked the request. "Of course you may cutie-pie." Rihanna knelt down and puckered her lips. Strange that for a guy it was pathetic and lame yet for a woman, especially one as gorgeous as Rihanna, it was insanely hot and inviting. Her lips then covered you all over for about seven seconds. It felt like Heaven being kissed by an angel. She stopped and you smiled into each others eyes. Perhaps this seemed like something special between you two. Rihanna then whispered to an amazing suggestion to you.
1522222222222111122.title: Innocence To More

1522222222222222221.title: Yes
